steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Illustrations' group, click on the 'Online Pictures' button.
A dialog box will appear. In the search box, type the keywords for the clip art you want to find.
Press Enter or click on the 'Search' button.
Browse through the search results and click on the clip art you want to insert.
Click on the 'Insert' button to insert the selected clip art into your document.
Adjust the size and position of the clip art as needed.
